name: Simple Platformer
description: Simple platform game I made in game maker studio 1.4 its nothing special. this game is not complete at all but it will give you a little taste of what you can make this into. the art work is not mine I got the tile set and the sprite was made by "Time Fantasy". all credit for the sprit art work goas to them. but enjoy the engine and their isent much to do no enemies but you can walk around and explore it a little. Thanks for any feedback I try my best to fix it as best I can.
